short_description: bellaphoria is a cosmetics store based in new brunswick, canada.
long_description: see for yourself why women all around the world are choosing bellaphoria's all natural cosmetics. usda organic makeup, non gmo makeup, corn free makeup, gluten free makeup, soy free makeup, usda organic cosmetics, non gmo cosmetics, corn free cosmetics, gluten free cosmetics, soy free cosmetics, dye free cosmetics, no fd&c dyes purest cosmetics world wide. bellaphoria offers the purest cosmetics world wide. bellaphoria is revolutionizing the cosmetic industry. made in canada "our commitment to excellence, purity and customer care makes bellaphoria stand above the rest!" healthy skin starts with bellaphoria. the products you buy help support communities in developing countries. we offer the purest cosmetics available on the market. you will always find the best eyeshaow shade to suit you with our section of over 50 all natural mineral eyeshadows. bellaphoria is located in ontario, canada. our all natural mineral foundation is a vitamin boost for your skin its will heal your skin while you are wearing it.

generated_description: bellaphoria is a company based in new brunswick, canada, specializing in the manufacturing of allergy-free, organic, natural, and food-grade mineral cosmetics. founded approximately 16 years ago, bellaphoria formulates and manufactures its products in-house to ensure quality assurance. the company's products are free from major allergens such as gluten, soy, corn, wheat, oat, and rice, and are non-toxic, talc-free, nut-free, and egg-free. bellaphoria's cosmetics are known for their high performance, with features like waterproofing, superior coverage, and hypoallergenic properties. the company sources its ingredients from canada, the usa, and europe, and is committed to cruelty-free practices. bellaphoria's products are widely recognized for their purity and effectiveness in treating conditions like acne, eczema, and rosacea.
